entry.title: The only real long-term solution is to make nodes participating in the protocol completely dumb to what is actually being processed. That’s actually ...
entry.summary: The only real long-term solution is to make nodes participating in the protocol completely dumb to what is actually being processed. That’s actually how the internet already works. By @calummoore ⛓️ https://blog.developerdao.com/ethereum-is-censoring-transactions#heading-the-road-to-better-censorship-resistance
